name: Ghost Dog (turnipboys)
description:
You are a dog. You are also a ghost. You’re Ghost Dog, and you’re in search of your precious Ghost Bone!

Ghost Dog is a short puzzle experience where the player is Ghost Dog, a dog with ghost powers that can swap bodies with the animal friends around them. By navigating around the world through the use of Ghost Dog’s ghost powers and the special abilities of their animal friends, players can solve the puzzles in order to gain the prized Ghost Bone!

Original beta release date: Nov 24, 2020. Still receiving active updates to fix bugs (occasionally).
